Authors: Kurniawan Y., Hiererra S.E., Nicholas H., Frendy J.S.
Title: The effect of indonesian e-marketplace reputation on customer trust in online shopping
Source title: Journal of Theoretical and Applied Information Technology
Affiliations: Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Kurniawan, Y., Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Hiererra, S.E., Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Nicholas, H., Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Frendy, J.S., Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: E-Marketplace is growing rapidly in Indonesia, and what is the problem of E-Marketplace, when is the level of customer confidence, both in marketplace services and the quality of sellers. This study aims to determine The Effect of Indonesian E-Marketplace Reputation on Customer Trust in Online Shopping. The method used in this research is analyzing Indonesian E-Marketplace reputation data by using the SmartPLS 3.0 application. The results of this research showed the positive significant effect of group reference and emarketplace reputation on trust and the trust factor give positive significant effect to relationship commitment of customer to the seller. The results of the study can be applied to the E-Marketplace to enhance the reputation of E-Marketplace companies in Indonesia. © 2005 - ongoing JATIT & LLS.
Author Keywords: Customers; E-Marketplace; Online; Reference; Trust in Online Shopping
